Will Sweet

Exploring catalysts of technology, business, and behavior

My name is Will Sweet. I’m the Founder of Shef, an efficient meal planning app for home cooks, and I’m currently pursuing my Masters in Computational Analytics at Georgia Tech (expected August 2018).

This site features my thoughts on business and technology, as well as a look at some of my projects. If anything I write interests you, reach out to me through twitter at the link below.

⋅ ⋅ ⋅

Favorite Books of Late: Ready Player One, Originals, Work Rules!, Shoe Dog, Steve Jobs, In the Plex, and The Everything Store.

Favorite Podcasts of Late: Exponent, The Tim Ferriss Show, Acquired, Masters of Scale, How I Built This, How to Start a Startup, Startup School Radio, and the a16z Podcast.

Disclaimer: For better or worse, all thoughts are my own.
